website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a mat that is comfortable to stand on and brings an element of style to your kitchen, this model will fit your needs.
pros: Offers a nice combination of comfortable foam cushioning and attractive patterns, so it looks as good as it feels
Comes in larger sizes, making it perfect for kitchen use
cons: Chemical-like smell is harsh at first, and tends to linger
Textured surface can be challenging to clean

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered one 24x70 and one smaller size for my kitchen. I was so pleased with the quality of this product that I ordered two more of the 24x70's also for my kitchen. I have very bad plantar fasciitis and these are wonderful on my feet as I love to be in the kitchen cooking and baking. They make it where I can spend a lot more time on my feet doing what I love. I would highly recommend these to anyone looking for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Brawley

customer_reviews.title: Nice & Cushioney
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these -- this one and the 70" long one. This one (39") is placed on the floor in front of our cooktop. Yes, I spend a lot of time there. It's nice and cushioney and easy to clean the food splatters off of it. The longer one is in front of the island where the sink, dishwasher and my main food prep area is. Love both of them. They look nice, too -- I've rec'd many compliments on them and believe several friends have also purchased some.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: Great mat! Thicker than we expected and it looks great in our kitchen. No more having to wash rug runners... spills are a simple clean up.
customer_reviews.author: M&D

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, thick mat for kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat. It is very thick and does not slide on our wood kitchen floor at all. It is a dark brown with black which matches our kitchen perfectly. I liked it so much that I ordered the smaller one for in front of our kitchen sink. Looks fantastic! If you want the dark (almost espresso colored) mat, make sure you are ordering the “dark antique”....other reviewers stated when ordering several that they didn’t match...I suspect they didn’t verify the correct color since there are two mats with same pattern but one is much lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Epic Garny

customer_reviews.title: My only disappointment is that I was unable to get the same ...
customer_reviews.text: This Butterfly Anti-fatigue mat has exceeded my expectations. It is very attractive and much thicker and more cushiony than I was expecting. The color and pattern are very pleasing. I have already ordered another Butterfly mat. My only disappointment is that I was unable to get the same pattern, but I did find one in the same color so that's okay. I definitely would recommend this mat to anyone looking for a high quality anti-fatigue mat. The price is reasonable too.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Pieklik

customer_reviews.title: Handsome mat
customer_reviews.text: This mat is very comfortable. Makes standing at the sink a pleasure. It's like having a little luxury for myself as I do my work. Actually I thought it would be plain brown, but the color, a mottled reddish brown, looks very handsome with my hardwood floor. I must say I was surprised and pleased. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Strauss

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was on the Frontgate website when I first saw this mat. It was $279.00 so I was very hesitant to buy as price was quite high. I decided to search amazon and WOW same mat for less then $90!!!!! It is perfect in my kitchen under my sink. I bought the cooper color and it looks perfect on my dark wood floors. Really blends in just like the picture. My sink is in a long island so the mat works out perfect cooking and cleaning. So easy to keep clean unlike carpet and so very comfortable to stand on when you're cooking and cleaning. Best buy yet!!
customer_reviews.author: Antioch

customer_reviews.title: Great cushioning for sore feet and knees!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these - one by the sink and one by the stove. A car ran over my foot, which had to be rebuilt. Standing became very painful for more than a few minutes. These mats are terrific and make standing so much easier, whether you are cooking or cleaning. Liked them so much, I bought one for my sister who had injured a knee. She was so grateful and said it was one of the most thoughtful gifts she had ever received. I'm thinking now about buying one for my laundry room. Really excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: William L Powers

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Wish I bought this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and design of this product more than I expected. I had this in my wishlist for so long because of price and now wish I had gotten it sooner. Looks like it does in pictures but the color is a bit nicer than i expected in person. Its comfortable and the size is as described. I think of my style as simple and elegant when it comes to home decor and this enriched the look of my kitchen. Just measure before you buy a kitchen mat because it is long. We measure everything and it was perfect fit for an sf kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable solid well made mats.
customer_reviews.text: They are solid made mats that are very very comfortable to stand on. Edges are beveled so no curling. I am very pleased with these mats. My only slight complaint was the color was a little darker than expected on the ones I bought and they did not have the smaller size in stock in front of stove at the time I ordered. Still very happy with purchased.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen mat hands down!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to spend this much on a kitchen mat but I'm SO glad I did. I've had it for a year now and it looks brand new. I bought a cheaper one last time and a friend's stiletto shoe destroyed it. This mat is way more durable and looks very expensive. It does slide a little bit on my wood floors (barely noticeable) but I fixed that with rug tape. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen mat, buy it
customer_reviews.text: Have had this kitchen mat about 6 months now and highly recommend it. Still looks great just like the photo, thick and comfortably squishy-soft to stand on while preparing meals. Lies flat all around, and the edges do not curl up or show no sign of breaking: a high-quality product. Plus the beveled edge all around leads my foot up onto the surface from the floor, so this old man doesn't stumble over it it like I used to do on my old, crumbling mat. Arrived packed flat in a huge shipping box, so no curls or folds to smooth out. Comfortable, well-made product.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Bill

customer_reviews.title: Homerun purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love our new mats. We ordered this size for our arthritic pug to stand on while he eats and two kitchen runners for in front of stove and sink, dishwasher so we can prep, cook and clean up without hurting our feet, knees, backs, etc. They are very attractive, stay in place, clean up easily, are half the cost of other brands and best of all, are cushiony and comfortable without you sinking down so far you trip. Like other reviewers we wonder why it took so long to order!
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: High quality and comfortably squishy
customer_reviews.text: Great price compared to gel mats and just as comfortably squishy, but supportive. Sent in a large box so it would not bend or get damaged. Wide, angled edges to avoid tripping on corners and easy for a Roomba vacuum or any other. Distinctive design, high quality weight and feel. One year update: This mat has held up beautifully and still looks brand new. After muddy boots left gravel and dirt on it, I was worried about gouges and scratches, but after washing it off, not a mark was left. Family recently visited and they loved walking on it so much that I ordered one for a birthday gift - they were thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Zchkai

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! Great cushion and design. I like the beveled edges so a decreased risk for catching your foot and tripping. I was continually tripping over my old fatigue mats. We have hardwood and tile floors, they stay in place and do not move as you step on them. I plan to buy another for my laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: RoxyMT71

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Runner
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited for this floor runner. It is so comfortable and exactly what I was looking for. The pattern is so striking, I had people over and everyone comment on how pretty it was. It is long enough to be in front of my sink and counter.
customer_reviews.author: Blee

customer_reviews.title: My husband & I both love these mats
customer_reviews.text: My husband & I both love these mats! We have had other brands, but these by far are the best. They are very comfortable, stay in place better than the others we've had and se have had no trip issues with these. They are also very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Hendershot

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous Look and Feel
customer_reviews.text: These mats are fantastic! I bought 3 smaller ones for kitchen sink area, bathroom sink and shower areas. Bought 2 larger ones for kitchen oven and washer/dryer areas. The relief they give to my feet when standing on them is paramount to thwarting off fatigue. They are also non-slip. I have a concrete floor and will probably purchase one more for use in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D.

customer_reviews.title: Spray Dark Antique is beautiful and super comfortable to stand on!
customer_reviews.text: I was really hesitant to order these kitchen mats, as I was afraid to waste my money on cheap-looking, thin, mats. Was I wrong! These mats are very cushiony and comfortable, as well as aesthetically pleasing. I just wish the seller offered more sizes in the Spray Dark Antique design. Spray Dark Antique is beautiful and super comfortable to stand on!
customer_reviews.author: ACHA

customer_reviews.title: Feet Love It
customer_reviews.text: Great mat, wonderful size. I always drip water when washing dishes this is long so it keeps my floor dry. Has a pretty design on top, the slant on sides is made well so you don't trip. Like standing on soft air. Shipped Quick in big box was not folded. Perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: pitsy88

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MAT... with a caveat:
customer_reviews.text: i like everything about this mat EXCEPT somehow a corner randomly split not long after purchase. i have no idea how it happened under completely ordinary use. unfortunately like anything made of memory foam, eventually that whole chunk will separate and fall off. which is too bad as it *will* spoil the looks of an otherwise attractive, functional mat. still, giving 4 stars for good colour & pattern, easy clean surface, and cushiony comfort for tired legs. would just suggest to interested shoppers, be extra cautious when moving mat around. it could have just been my bad luck to get one with a random weak spot... or could be an inherent design flaw
customer_reviews.author: yb

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to stand on
customer_reviews.text: These mats, and I have a few, are comfortable to stand on, but are not easy to clean. The design makes it difficult to simply wipe off. Things get caught in the "curves". They material cleans easily, the design makes it difficult. I am not sure about pain relief, but it is helpful in that way, I am sure. The value is the comfort and the protection of my wood floors,
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Still love 2yrs in
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mat-- thick cushion, attractive pattern, easy to clean, non-skid bottom. I've had one for two years, and moved to a house with a bigger kitchen so just bought a second to match. No complaints about the one I've had for two years. If I get another for laundry room, I will reorder from this listing again. I will mention the 70" do not ship flat as stated in description, they are folded in half (at least mine was). However, there is no crease or damage that I can see, it lay flat on the floor instantly upon unfolding.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Like pillows under your feet!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mat for one week now and I no longer experience back pain while preparing meals & doing dishes. I spend a lot of time in the kitchen and this is the comfort that I have been looking for. The mat eliminates leg stress and adds just enough height for cooking comfort. It is easy to clean. It does not slide. Both the color & design go well with any decor. I couldn't be happier with the butterfly mat. The friendly customer service has followed up with several emails to me wanting to know if their product meets my satisfaction. This shows that the customer is still valued after the sale.
customer_reviews.author: Janis

customer_reviews.title: feet and legs relief
customer_reviews.text: This mat DOES seem to do the trick as an anti-fatigue mat. I am not thrilled with its look, however. Before I bought this, I was shopping for a similar product at Frontgate. There mats were MUCH more expensive. I feel like I should have held out, saved, and bought one of theirs. The finish on this mat is garish. I also feel like the color will rub off in short order. I am not thrilled with it. In fact, I wish I hadn't bought it. It just looks tacky. (it DOES feel good, though)
customer_reviews.author: Cally Fromme

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful mats, well made/ your search stops here!
customer_reviews.text: Your search for a kitchen mat stops here. These are beautiful mats, well made, look strong and expensive and are very comfortable cushiony on your feet. I bought the Quatrefoil in 2 sizes and they exactly match my Maple kitchen cabinets with a black rope decoration. Very very happy with them. They are an exact color match to my cabinets although in the photograph they look different!!! LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.author: Marathon running Pharmacist

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Items smells really bad, even afters of days sitting out in the open. had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Worth

customer_reviews.title: Great !!
customer_reviews.text: Only had for a month....so far so good. Other brands I've had in the past have not held up without the surface ripping The design is great, gel/foam padding is very comfortable..hopefully the surface will last. Next time I think I'll go for the 72" length merely for the purpose of covering more real estate from my sink to the adjacent cabinets and dishwasher....My dogs also love to lay on it while we are on the other side of the kitchen cooking.
customer_reviews.author: ericwp5

customer_reviews.title: I’m disappointed because they are so close together in the kitchen ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second mat I ordered. The first one is in front of my refrigerator and the 2nd one I ordered is in front of the sink. They were suppose to be the same design and color, but when it arrived the color is off. The first mat had a more antique distressed look around the edges and this mat does not. I’m disappointed because they are so close together in the kitchen and the difference is noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put in my kitchen for prep and cooking. I had a smaller mat that was in front on my sink, but I found I would always go back and forth between stove, counter and sink. This is the perfect length that I can stand on it the entire time I'm cooking. It's definitely helped with my foot pain.
customer_reviews.author: amowrey715

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this mat to replace a previous one bought from another company. My main draw was the generous lip on mat which takes away the trip factor. Previous mat had a small edge which curled up and I kept tripping over. Am VERY pleased with this one.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Barksdale

customer_reviews.title: Comfy under my feet
customer_reviews.text: Nice and cushy under my feet. I do not trip over the edges as I have done with some flatter mats. Does not roll up, does not slide around on the floor, but it's easy to move if I want to move it. Wipes up clean in a jiffy. Came flat in a HUGE box (LOL, I didn't envy my UPS deliverer coming up our steep driveway to bring the box to the porch), but it was FLAT, not rolled up. No smell sometimes associated with new rubber-type products at all. I took it out of the box and put it in service right away. Liked it so well I bought 2 more the next day!
customer_reviews.author: RBW

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This mat is gorgeous and so far very easy to clean. I really cannot speak to durability yet since I have only had it a few days but so far I love it! And I don’t trip over it like I have several other anti-fatigue mats, due to their thickness. Very excited to cook a holiday meal while standing on this mat!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah U

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our new kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: After a minor indoor flood ruined our kitchen floor and cabinets, we had new hickory flooring installed. We looked for mats to put in front of the sink, dishwasher and stove to protect our investment and came up with these mats. They are great at protecting the floor, and so comfortable they beg to be walked on bare foot..
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: It's A Mat R of Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: The Butterfly Anti-Fatigue mat works very well. We have a tile floor in the kitchen, and standing on that floor for any length of time while preparing food, washing dishes, cleaning, etc., is very fatiguing. This mat helps immensely with that. The only caveat is that you have to watch your step when near it. You can trip on the edges. Just be careful, and there should be no problem. The mat cleans up very easily, too. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: P. Gilman

customer_reviews.title: Live the sloped edges.
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for now. Will see how it fairs in time. Love it for in front of my kitchen sink. Bought to replace an older one from another seller that was well worn with use, and a big dog, over several years. I like this one better as it has a sloped edge to avoid any possible tripping hazard. Firmer than expected, but still pleasant under foot. Like that it's nearly the same time as my wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Julie N.

customer_reviews.title: These mats are very well made and Look great! I have been a massage therapist for 25 ...
customer_reviews.text: These mats are very well made and Look great! I have been a massage therapist for 25 years and was time for some extra accommodations for my comfort. I purchased 4 mats two Long for the length of my table and one each for the head and foot. Has made a world of difference for me instead of standing on a hard floor for hours a day. Many of my clients have inquired as to where to buy as they like them as well getting off and on the table. These mats would also work well in a kitchen, craft room, or standing work station. Quick shipping was a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for two
customer_reviews.text: This mat covers the entire area in front of our sink and counter for meal prep. My husband and I frequently cook together and now both of us get to stand on it. It’s very easy to wipe clean and sweep. It looks nice with our wood floor and distressed cream cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado USA

customer_reviews.title: Not a soft, cushiony material (kinda hard on top)
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable (cushiony) as the smaller mat I purchased of a different brand at Costco . . .. Also, does not adhere to the floor at all and moves with the slightest touch of the foot . . .I will not return, but I wish I would of ordered the alternative mat that I was looking at at AMazon.com 12/12/19: I love these mats after all! They softened up and are easy to clean plus comfortable to stand on!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. S

customer_reviews.title: Thick & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very thick and comfortable. They are not all black like I wanted but they go with my decor. I went back and read the description. The color indicated that patterns and gray are in the mat so it’s my fault on the color. The mats feel so good and comfortable. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Living Life

customer_reviews.title: Classy Old World Style Floor Matt for Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Love this thick, old world style decor mat! My husband even commented it looks really nice by the kitchen sink.
customer_reviews.author: MoodyBluesLover

customer_reviews.title: crack easily
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these I like and several of the shorter ones that work well. The last long one arrived cracked in a rolled configuration. The two before sent folded did not arrive cracked in spite of warnings not to fold and to roll them. Moving them to a new house could be problematic for the long ones. They all retain dirt/dust but I like the shorter ones for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a Height Adjustable Desk, Use in the Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: We originally bought this for our height adjustable desk, but it ended up being a bit of a pain next to the desk chairs (wheels often running into mat when we tried to pull the chair in). We ended putting it next to the sink in the kitchen and it has been a wonderful addition there.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat to put in my living room so my dogs would have a softer place to land when they jump off the chair. It looks very stylish with our wood floors and is super easy to clean. It's well made and seems like it will be durable. I am considering getting a few more for our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: wendyleigh

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice mats
customer_reviews.text: I love these mats they are heavy so they do not slide on my hardwood which has been a pain for me to find and they are nice and plush under foot. The color of them is so nice and rich and they are a very good size. I would recommend these to anyone that stands a lot in their kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Shop Prime in MI

customer_reviews.title: Feels amazing, but slips and moves
customer_reviews.text: I scoured the reviews before I splurged on this mat and I saw that various people mentioned how the mat slips. Well.... it definitely does. Pros: Feels really amazing to stand on; does the trick when you are standing for long or short periods. Another PRO is that it's quite large. Cons: Slips. I've nearly fallen twice and I'm considering buying some sort of tape to make it more tacky to the tile.
customer_reviews.author: Jane in Texas

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfy as I hoped for, bc there is not much give AND they move around a ton!!
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: So nice underfoot!
customer_reviews.text: Oh, my goodness! How wonderful to stand on these mats. I bought a long one to put in front of sink island, another in front of stove. Have had them for one week only so can't say anything about durability, but so far, these are so good to stand. I have back problems and these mats make standing so much easier. If they hold up, it is money well spent. And did I mention how beautiful they are?
customer_reviews.author: A. Schoellhorn

customer_reviews.title: Feels good under your feet
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks of the mat and the padding is sufficient. My only complaint iis it shifts around on the floor. I will have to put something underneath to keep it from moving. Its priced lower than the mat I had before which was much heavier so didn't shift around. If they added more weight to this one it would probably stay in place. We'll see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customerc

customer_reviews.title: Great mats! Do yourself a favor and buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Mats are fantastic!! Exactly what we needed for many hours spent standing at the counter. My only complaint is the shipping end of things, no complaints at all about the mats themself. Ordered two identical mats at the same time and they came through two different carriers on two different days. The real kicker was that one of the mats came rolled up in a box and when we opened it there was a large sticker on it stating do not roll up or bend. All of this is just a side note, I highly recommend these mats.
customer_reviews.author: Hopes Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Standing tall
customer_reviews.text: I bought the larger one. It’s nice. Very comfortable to stand on. The detail on the pattern isn’t high, but it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: The way it is designed, you do not trip on it.
customer_reviews.text: Especially like the size of this mat. It gives me 70” of cushioned comfort in front of my sink and counter where I do most of my prep work for cooling. It is easy to clean, however it takes a little extra effort because of the pattern having a slight intention. It really is no big deal! It is also very well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Carol J. Dederich

customer_reviews.title: Lies totally flat on floor --Low fall risk
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that it is virtually impossible to trip on the edges of the Butterfly Long Kitchen Anti Fatigue Mat. No edge curling. Extremely comfortable to stand on. Can't think of ANY negatives about this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: jewel53

customer_reviews.title: An Anti-Fatigue Mat that Looks Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: This anti-fatigue mat is exceptional as well as adding a beautiful look to our kitchen. It is extremely well made and my wife really enjoys cooking while using it. The shipping packaging was also quite good as I expected it to be rolled up to ship, but they shipped it fully flat so that it would not be warped on delivery. WELL DONE!!!
customer_reviews.author: KORBz

customer_reviews.title: Effectively collects dust and dirt.
customer_reviews.text: Not strong. Effectively collects dust and dirt. Poorly cleaned. Excessively thick for warm weather. Easily moves on the floor tiles.
customer_reviews.author: Yuriy V Sharikov

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.text: I lover these! I bought 2 and then added a third because I liked them so much. relieves back pain due to standing so much while Im cooking. They are easy to clean and very comfortable. Will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This makes standing in the kitchen cooking or doing dishes much more bearable. Not to mention it's so much more sanitary to have these rugs in your kitchen vs. cloth rugs that trap dust, dirt, food etc. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: HSquared

customer_reviews.title: Nice & Cushiony
customer_reviews.text: I have this one in front of my kitchen island - this is where the sink, dishwasher and my main food prep area is. Very nice, comfortable. Guests have commented on them and some may have purchased some as well after seeing mine (including my daughter). The grandkids love to walk on it barefoot.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Morgan

customer_reviews.title: The mats are beautiful and of good quality
customer_reviews.text: The mats are beautiful and of good quality. There was a manufacturing issue and customer service quickly resolved the issue, honored their lifetime warranty and sent a new replacement for the damaged original. Thank you for your time and wonderful customer service.
customer_reviews.author: llousley

customer_reviews.title: Butterfly Anti-Fatigue Mat
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice mat. It is super comfortable to stand on and is very durable. It will be easy to clean. Very satisfied with this purchase. I would recommend it to others. We needed a large mat to fill the area and this size was perfect. Fast shipping and we felt the price was in accordance with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: m3

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: While comfortable to stand on, the mat slips TOO MUCH!
customer_reviews.author: Radio Fan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kitchen mat for tired legs and feet!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a longer mat with a graduated edge to put in front of the kitchen sink and dishwasher. I really liked this particular color and design. When I got the mat, I thought my sister would enjoy it so I gave her mine and ordered another one for myself. It is so comfortable and easy to clean. I'm sold!
customer_reviews.author: V. Manderfield

customer_reviews.title: Great price with comfort and beauty !
customer_reviews.text: These are super nice. Easy to clean and comfortable st stand on. I have a long runner under my sink and dishwasher . Another under the stove . I actually get compliments from family on how nice they look and comfortable to stand .
customer_reviews.author: Trapper

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to pay this much for a rug, but it is the best thing I have ever paid money for. It is so comfortable, so easy to clean, and they look really good too. I have convinced my mother and sisters to purchase these as well. We are all very happy with product. You can stand on these all day long and no problems, with your feet or back! Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Charboneau

customer_reviews.title: Excellent padding
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for salespeople on their feet all day. 4 stars because over time, the top layer of foam degrades but that’s to be expected (we’re open 9-9 so lots of use.) I restock on my knees- very comfortable. I just recorded. Very attractive too.
customer_reviews.author: Karen K

customer_reviews.title: It looks good at first...
customer_reviews.text: *UPDATE* 10 months later, I am not so happy with this products longevity. I bought this mat because it was visually pleasing, however it has severely faded and I am already shopping for a new one due to its appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Misswrx

customer_reviews.title: Will never use a kitchen rug again I am now a mat user
customer_reviews.text: I was presently surprised by the difference this mat made in my small kitchen. Up until now I have used rug in front of the sink for style purposes only. Love the new look and feel on my feet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really like the support from these mats
customer_reviews.text: Really like the support from these mats, they are super cushioned and help while standing for awhile. The only issue might be that they don't look quite a impressive in person as they in the picture. They still look good, but not as good in the ad.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Morris

customer_reviews.title: I received them quickly and they arrived in excellent condition (shipped flat in a large box)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two matts. I received them quickly and they arrived in excellent condition (shipped flat in a large box). I have them in front of the stove and in front of the kitchen sink. They are much better than standing on the hard floor during cooking and cleanup. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Better than I could have imagined
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful!! They have more cushion than more expensive ones and they look great! Plus the taper of the rug eliminates trash getting under it and the edges to roll!!
customer_reviews.author: sherri lucky

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love my new mat for the kitchen. Bigger size is nice too so you're not stepping off & on. So glad I did not cancel it.... which I considered since the cost seemed a little high, but worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Be careful on color...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the long one and received it Saturday today the shorter one came, both stated as same color but the short one is darker which really shows as the are in same room. Not very happy with that
customer_reviews.author: Susan Madden

customer_reviews.title: Less stress in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Feels great--don't want to get off of it! And it looks good! Now, a few months later, I ordered a second one! I found myself so happy on the mat that I simply tried to do my food prep nearly in the kitchen sink in order to stay on it. Now I have one in front of my chopping block as well as my sink...and I am really happy! I didn't realize how hard my tile floors were until I stepped onto these mats!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Root

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat
customer_reviews.text: I received the kitchen mat other day and placed it by the kitchen sink. I'm impressed on how nice this kitchen mat looks and how comfortable it is to stand on and how well it is made. The mat has a good weight to it so it doesn't move around on the floor. The color has a rich look with different shades of brown. This mat is soft and has a thick cushion, also its easy to clean. Glad that i made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: just love it
customer_reviews.text: love the design, the comfort, it's heavy and doesn't slide and easy to clean. Hasn't worn out at all in many months of use
customer_reviews.author: Chris W

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying this mat and a longer version just like it that we purchased at the same time... we wanted to replace the existing mats we had in our kitchen for 4+ years. The Butterfly mats are so much better--mainly they do not slide and stay where we put them, and they match the tone of our laminate flooring quite well.
customer_reviews.author: DM in Shelburne

customer_reviews.title: ... my copper/tuscan kitchen be complete and i was very disappointed to see that it was orange and hardly copper ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to order this and have my copper/tuscan kitchen be complete and i was very disappointed to see that it was orange and hardly copper at all, i love the pattern and it’s extremely comfortable but I’m very upset about the color not being what was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Laykin Avery Huber

customer_reviews.title: It is very soft to stand on. The only ...
customer_reviews.text: It is very soft to stand on. The only problem I can see is that it travels and I have to keep pushing it back. Not really too big a deal. Maybe the stuff you put under rugs to keep them in place will work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They feel as good as they look.
customer_reviews.text: I used the long one in front of my island and shorter one at the sink. The are really soft to stand on you can feel the cushion. I had GelPro for years but the corners started to turn up so when I saw these I was drawn to the way they lay flat on the floor but what I love about them is the cushion feel and they are really pretty. I know I'll enjoy them for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela H Sapp

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but worth it! I have tried many different types of anti-fatigue mats but my legs ended up aching after doing dinner dishes. With this one I don't have to flop into my recliner afterwards. I could actually go dancing! I will be buying two more, one for the stove and the other for the island.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful on my tiled kitchen floor
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful on my tiled kitchen floor. I was experiencing lower back pain after being on my feet for a couple hours at a time in the kitchen, so my husband got these mats to see if they would help. No more back pain! I plan to order another one soon
customer_reviews.author: susan p wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Practical and Functional
customer_reviews.text: This stays in place and the beveled edge prevents tripping on the mat's edge. The color is pleasing and it is easy to clean with a quick wipe. Comfortable too. This is a product I did not know I needed and now wonder how I did without it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Hersh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mat to cover those hard tile floors.
customer_reviews.text: This was pricey, but looks brand new, one year later. I stand on it all day, in the kitchen, and can not tell I’m standing in a tile floor.
customer_reviews.author: Nell

customer_reviews.title: Make your feet happy
customer_reviews.text: Makes a huge difference while standing in one place for more than a few minutes, Nice discreet pattern. Adds a little flare to the hardwood floor and protecting from spills.
customer_reviews.author: Merrilee Willer

customer_reviews.title: Tile Kitchen? Sore back? A must have.
customer_reviews.text: Title pretty much sums it up, after years of standing on tile kitchen floor it wears on you. It's nice to have support and comfort now and this is extremely durable and thick
customer_reviews.author: matt Sipe

customer_reviews.title: I will be purchasing another for my sink area!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mat and nicely padded, used it on floor near my kitchen island. Has brought relief while working at the cutting board. Have had no issues with it sliding on tile. The box it arrived in was excessively large, but my son enjoyed playing in it (lol). Great mat, beautifully designed, speedy delivery, all at a great price= WIN!
customer_reviews.author: L Folsom

customer_reviews.title: So sqishy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mat!! It is so squishy and comfortable. It makes standing doing the dishes and cooking so much easier on my feet, knees and back. You need this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Munisteri

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and size is good for in front of our cabinets. We actually purchased two of these. I wish they had additional sizes in this style other than just two. Slightly darker than the smaller sized mats.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Family

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for at roughly half the price of anything comparable. Very surprised at how thick and durable the mat is, seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: G Clowers

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and attractive cushioned kitchen mats
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I bought these was to help relieve the pain of standing on ceramic tile for hours at a time. The mats are thick and comfortable. They’re going to help me stand in the kitchen longer without worrying about the pain of plantar fasciitis in my feet or arthritis in my knees. They look nice, although darker than I really wanted. So far, wipe up has been easy. They don’t have a bad odor like a lot of rubber mats.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Lark Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Shipped in a day, and it's even nicer than it looks in the pictures. Very thick and heavy enough not to move/shift on the floor. The shipped it rolled up even though it says on the mat to "ship laying flat". But because of its weight it laid flat once rolled out. Would definitely buy another one if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: Love these anti fatigue mats. They are pretty, easy to clean, thick and cushiony, and they don't move. Yeah! Good purchase. Puts Walmart mats to shame.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Dye one!
customer_reviews.text: Hey the product was good functionally.. but Iwe get black dye on our legs after staying on.. and it spread all over our carpet.. was expecting this will disappear as days go.. it's been an year no change... my carpet became black on the mean while.. Highly disturbed after giving a lot of money.. Got 2 pieces for my kitchen.. It was good to my feet and knees..
customer_reviews.author: madhavi

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to place in front of my sink to help minimize foot fatigue on days when I decide to do a little cooking. It looks quite nice and serves the purpose. I love how it feels under my feet!
customer_reviews.author: Karri

customer_reviews.title: Save your back, get these!
customer_reviews.text: I put two of these in my hardwood kitchen. They are a nice accent and protect my back as well as the floors.
customer_reviews.author: michael vowell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mat for those standing on hard surfaces for a short time or even better for longer time periods.
customer_reviews.text: My wife is very happy with this mat. Very soft and a good cushion for her feet while working in the kitchen. It is surprisingly light but does not slip on the tile floor. Cleans very easily also.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This mat is beautiful and so cushy. It’s large and covers multiple work area in my kitchen. It shifts easily if I need to work in opposite side of kitchen. Functional and good looking.
customer_reviews.author: BV

customer_reviews.title: Padded Kitchen Mat
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love it. Very comfortable and easy to clean. Should have bought it a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Ghizzoni

customer_reviews.title: Liked these so much I order them twice
customer_reviews.text: Liked these so much I order them twice. If you do a lot of standing, these are a great way to keep your feet happy!
customer_reviews.author: Skeeter

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely a great mat. I wish I had an entire kitchen floor this comfortable. It is in front of the sink but thinking of another for the front of the stove. The color is great...I could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Brey

product_meta.title: Butterfly Long Kitchen Anti Fatigue Mat Comfort Floor Mats - Perfect for Kitchen and Standing Desks, Material, Waterproof Kitchen Floor Mat, 24 x 70 inches, Dark.Antique
product_meta.description:
Size:24" x 70" x 3/4"| Color:Quatrefoil Dark BrownSTARTING TODAY: Enjoy A New Life in Your Kitchen With Butterfly Kitchen Mat! 

Are you feeling soreness in my feet / lower leg / hips after long periods of time standing while cooking in the kitchen? 

Are you suffering lower back pain, leg fatigue and feet ache after long time standing desk work? 

Not Anymore! Relieve Your Pain, Ache, Pressure and Fatigue With The Best Butterfly Comfort Mat, Save Yourself Time & Effort! 

It not only provides a soft, cushiony and supportive standing experience, but also can promote the body circulation and reduce the fatigue caused by long time standing. 

Enjoy the Anti Fatigue Mat delivers in the Kitchen, Office, Standing Desk, Garage, Salon, Laundry, Bathroom, Workstation or Restaurant 

Beautiful & Safe Design and Supreme Quality Combined! 

➤ Special beautiful Quatrefoil surface pattern design. The Dark Antique finishes is a true cook's classic color and it provides a warm and bright accent for the home 

➤ Heavy Duty,Large & Thick (24 x 70 x 3/4"). Butterfly anti-fatigue floor mats are made from commercial grade memory foam materials which will not break down over time 

➤ Contoured beveled edge design and no-curl edges prevent tripping hazard. Non-slip bottom to keep the mats firmly & securely in place 

➤ Kid and Pet friendly material, safe for children and pets. Waterproof surface, stain resistant and easy to clean, maintain and decorative to home kitchen/office. 

We Stand Behind Everything That We Produce! 

If you are not thrilled with the standing mat - it comes long with an 100% money back guarantee! 

What Are You Waiting For? Click the "Add To Cart" Button To Try Your Anti-Fatigue Mat Today!
feature_bullets: DESIGN: This kitchen mat come with special beautiful Quatrefoil surface pattern design with Dark.Antique finishes. Designed to be elegant and to provides a warm accent for the home kitchen & standing desk.
COMFORT: The extra thick 3/4" revolutionary anti fatigue kitchen mat is ergonomically engineered and proven to provide exceptional comfort, safety, relief and well-being while you stand.

DURABLE: Highest quality materials will not break down or compress over time. Strong, durable support for high traffic areas.Waterproof,durable, oil resistant and easy care. Simply wipe clean with a damp cloth or sponge, Kindly note that you'd better not to use any household cleaner or soapy water which will damage the floor mat.

SAFE: Textured surface and advanced beveled non-curl edge design helps prevent slipping and tripping. Non-slip bottom keeps the comfort mat on marble, tiles, wood or any type of flooring firmly & securely in place.

WELL MADE STANDING MAT THICK AND CUSHIONY FOR YEARS: Very comfortable standing mat great for behind a counter at a coffee shop or washing dishes front of your sink at the kitchen. The fatigue mat can relieve foot soreness, you would love stepping on it every time. Anyone like hair stylists, shop mechanics, cashiers standing long periods of time need this comfort floor mat.
